title: Music Data Analysis
content: This project merges and analyzes datasets on top songs, Spotify streams, and AOTY ratings to explore music trends. It examines sales, streams, downloads, and ratings to uncover insights about artist impact and platform influence. Includes data cleaning, merging strategies, and visualizations to highlight key findings on global music trends.

title: HSE Schedule Client
content: Live scheduling application built for HSE High School. Features include real-time calendar management and clock updates, improving accessibility and usability for students and staff.

title: HSE Admin App
content: A comprehensive web application designed for school administrators to manage schedules, events, announcements, and courses. Built with Next.js, it streamlines administration processes and enhances efficiency.

title: Roary's Shelter
content: A website for Roary's Shelter to fight food insecurity at HSE High School by ensuring anonymous access to essential resources. Developed with React and integrated mapping functionality.

title: HSE Clubs
content: A centralized platform for HSE High School clubs, making it easier for students to explore, join, and manage clubs. Hosted on Vercel, built with JavaScript, and integrated with Google Cloud.

title: March Madness ML
content: A machine learning model designed to predict NCAA March Madness brackets with a 63% accuracy rate. Utilizes detailed season and tournament data for training and evaluation.
